price: 43. En dat wat zij gewend was naast Allah te aanbeden heeft haar weerhouden (van de islam, want alle profeten waren moslims), want zij was van het ongelovige volk.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
